csvs.name: candlepin-throughput/input_data_files/post_consumers_uuid_entitlements_cdk.csv
csvs.projection: o.account as ownerkey, max(p.id) as poolid, prod.product_id as sku, concat(p.quantity,'') as totalAvailable, '2018-06-20' as expires
csvs.from: cp_pool p, cp_owner o, cp2_products prod
csvs.selection: p.owner_id = o.id and  p.product_uuid = prod.uuid and prod.product_id = 'MCT3295' and p.enddate > now()

csvs.name: candlepin-throughput/input_data_files/post_consumers_uuid_entitlements2.csv
csvs.projection: o.account as ownerkey, max(p.id) as poolid, 'ES0113909' as sku, concat(p.quantity,'') as totalAvailable, '2018-06-20' as expires
csvs.from: cp_pool p, cp_owner o, cp2_products prod
csvs.selection: p.owner_id = o.id and  p.product_uuid = prod.uuid and prod.product_id = 'ES0113909' and prod.entity_version is null

csvs.name: candlepin-throughput/input_data_files/post_consumers_uuid_entitlements.csv
csvs.projection: o.account as ownerkey, p.id as poolid, prod.product_id as sku, concat(p.quantity,'') as totalAvailable, '2018-06-20' as expires
csvs.from: cp_pool p, cp_owner o, cp2_products prod
csvs.selection: p.owner_id = o.id and  p.product_uuid = prod.uuid and prod.product_id = 'ES0113909' and prod.entity_version is null and p.quantity < 0

csvs.name: candlepin-throughput/input_data_files/hypervisors.csv
csvs.projection: account as ownerkey, concat((FLOOR( 1 + RAND( ) * 60 )), '') as numVirtHosts, concat((FLOOR( 1 + RAND( ) * 500 )), '') as numVirtGuests

csvs.name: candlepin-throughput/input_data_files/consumer_uuids-serials.csv
csvs.projection: c.uuid as consumer_uuid, concat(cert.serial_id,'') as serials
csvs.from: cp_consumer c, cp_entitlement ent, cp_ent_certificate cert
